items.title: Manba Finance IPO opens today: GMP up 50%; should you subscribe?
items.description: Manba Finance unlisted shares were trading at a premium of Rs 60 in the grey market, reflecting a 50 per cent gain over the IPO's upper end price of Rs 120, underscoring positive investor sentiment

items.title: IPO fever hits D-Street: 10 opening, 13 listing to lure investors next week
items.description: Maintaining its momentum, the Indian primary market is poised to captivate investors in the next week, with the launch of two mainline, and as many as eight SME initial public offerings (IPOs)

items.title: Arkade Developers IPO: 50% listing gain on cards? Check GMP, expected price
items.description: Arkade Developers shares are expected to make their market debut with listing on the BSE, and NSE tomorrow; here's what GMP hints about listing

items.title: Northern Arc IPO listing buzz: GMP resurges 55%; check likely listing price
items.description: Northern Arc Capital shares are poised for their market debut tomorrow. Here's what GMP trends indicate about the listing prospects

items.title: Upcoming IPO! Casagrand Premier files DRHP for Rs 1,100-cr issue with Sebi
items.description: KFin Technologies is the registrar to the offer, while JM Financial and Motilal Oswal Investment Advisors are the book-running lead managers to the issue

items.title: Eyeing entry into affordable housing loans: Godrej Capital MD & CEO
items.description: Shah discussed NBFCs' recent plans for affordable housing and initial public offerings
